name: Rough Waters - Romance in High Seas
name_original: Rough Waters - Romance in High Seas
description:
You are the last survior of that terrible pirate boarding on your ship.  Your captain has been executed but you have been given clemency, but who knows for how long?

Uncover the mysteries and the conspiracies aboard the Wet-Willy, form alliances, friendships or rivalries.
Discover how romantic the life of a pirate can be!
